title: @Riot Kateykhaos Play with me for my 2000th win please?
body:
All in the title, I haven't done anything for my 1000th wins since it happened long before those threads became popular (played a lot less to grind my second thousand) and I was wondering if my favorite rioter would agree to play with me for my 2000th win.

I'm currently sitting at 1979 normal wins so it shouldn't be long before i get the 21 missing. (Ofc i have more if we count ranked but... RANKED IS SOMETHING ELSE!)

Pretty please? I can sacrifice a Teemo if it helps (or a lot of teemo, i don't really care :D )
